name: irma-web-frontend
description: CSS and Javascript to simplify and standardize the IRMA login flow

scripts.clean: npm run clear && npm run fonts && npm run rebuild
scripts.png-images: echo "// This file is auto-generated from the images directory, so don't bother manually changing it." > stylesheets/variables/png-images.scss; for file in images/png/*; do [ -e "$file" ] || continue; base64=`base64 "$file"`; name=`basename "$file" .png`; echo "\$png-image-$name: 'data:image/png;base64,$base64';" >> stylesheets/variables/png-images.scss; done
scripts.dev: npm run clean && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-stylesheets" "npm run watch-fonts" "npm run watch-images" "npm run serve"
